TheRealMeaningOfScene;;

scene is not a fucking branch of from emo its another way of saying ur a fucking try hard at it.
:]]

scene kid equals someone who runs around changing who they are because of what everyones talking about, whats supposed to be cool or what will get them the most attention they go with the scene of things HENCE THE NAME!!

they also do exactly what the stereotype says that whatever there trying to be is. Like take emo for example the stereotype (which is completely wrong by the way) says that an emo must have a fringe were skinnys dress all in black where band t-shirts have a mail back listen to MCR, be depressed write a diary, slit there wrists and cry for hours. A scene kid would do exactly that and be exactly that.

I'm so sick of people running around calling them selves scene and saying its another form of emo ITS FUCKING NOT!!!

If you call ur self scene there a fucking try hard and thats what you have been calling yourself all this time. Now you should go burn and die
:]]

Example of a scene kid:
This kid at the start of the year was skater as skating was the in thing and everyone was doing it.
But then gangstas came into the lime light and he was no longer skater but a Gangsta.
Then everyone started to gossip about Gothics and they were given a lot of attention so this kid all of a sudden became Gothic
But then everyone stopped talking about Gothics so he said "oh being Gothic just is int for me" and moved back to a gangsta
But then everyone started talking about emos and holy shit what do u know he is now emo everyone.
But then we went back to school the next year and what do you know he wasn't emo anymore cos no one was talking about them anymore.
So do the world a favor and stop fucking calling your self scene your just embarrassing yourself by calling yourself a try hard

Poem;;

what is life??
is life there to be lived??
or is it there to be destroyed??

are we born to live
yet we live to die??
is life a beautiful creation
or a curse droped down upon us??

is life a miracle that should be treasured
or something that should be throwen away??
should we look after our lifes cos we only have one
or should we party hard??

Life is a barren land full of toxic waste
we must weave through the mine fields
& dodge the falling bombs

we must breathe the poisend air
& choke on our lies
we will bleed the memories
through our heart and in to our eyes

cry the tears of the lost and lonley
lay amoung the dead and forgotten
run through the grave yards of the suicide corpses
we cradle our hearts broken and torn
we die slowly and die young
burried in this earth
covered in our blood
that we have shed

every breath we take
is a silent scream
every laugh we create
just a desprete plea for help
every smile we fake
just another scar of the life thats been deemed

Life is a battle that i have lost
Nothing feels good nothing feels right
so as i put this gun to my head
i whisper im not alright

Lyrics;;

Heeyy,
these are some lyrics i came up with what you think??

Kiss the blade that cuts as i lay here dying tonite
Let ir rip out your throat and leave you bleeding to death
As i put this gun to my head i scream im not alright
Your just another tragic fucking teen suicide, spralled across the news headlines
Nothing in this world is alright

Poem 2;;

as i sit alone in the dark of the night and the cold of the winter
the rain poor down on me
so angry so fierce
it washes away the lies and past of my life

I watch my blood mix with the tears of a broken heart
i cradle my heart it stains my chest
so much hurt this pain will not end

lying in a pool of my own flesh bones
i relise im a lost cause
to far gone to hear my screams for help
i walk along the graveyeard of the tradgic suicides

so i sit and wait for my judgement day
to weak and tired to carry on
no strength left in my sole
your knife ran through it with no signs of stoping.

its a work in progress

Is it just me?

Is it just me or is year 12 the most shot box of a year to be alive?
I mean not only do we have to deal with the stress and horrors of facing our last year of schooling and the rest of our lives, i mean as if thats not enough, all the emotional issues and complications of being a teenager seem to be at the very peak. Everywhere i turn problems are happening things are changing and there changing for ever, its scary knowing i can never go back to when things where simple and that my life will forever be changing and seiese to be as i know it. All of this is reall quite daunting and i just want to abort to fetal position, shut out the world and cry.

You got some nerve Mr.

Okay, so guess who just got a text from the ex? after a month and a half out of the blue i get a text from the jackarse! after everything he put me through that arsehole has some freaking nerve! He dumps me the night after my formal, after i spend $165 to get him there after we get hell couply photos he says he loves me and that he will never break my heart that night, after telling me i was all he ever wanted and he wanted us to last for ever after trying to force me to have a kid with me after telling me i was the only girlfriend he had ever trusted and loved me more than any of the others
He makes it a root and boot that morning, and to make it worse i was drunk brakes up with me over freaking facebook cos he hasn't got the guts to do it in perosn telling me some bullshit story about how he still loves me but he cant stand to upset me all the time and hour after this hes hooking in with some other girl which means he was probably cheating on me with her then just over a week later he is now in a relationship with her and doesn't even have the fucking balls to tell me that was the real reason why he was breaking up im going to smash his face into the god damn freaking conrete ground and break every bone is his freaking face if i ever see his arse in public

Becoming a Nun.

Thats it! im truley over it!
i am becoming a nun seriously.
I wont have to deal with boys and there fucking shit they put me through.
I can not believe my ex tells me im immature because i said i don't want anything to do with him
after everything he put me through how could he even possible think that it was okay to contact me? and that there was any chance in hell that i would be okay with it and that i would want to talk to him?
He hasnt changed one fucking bit, still the insenstitve fucker who thinks he can do anything he wants and not bear the consequences.
Well i got news for you Mr. this is one ex who you can not string along.
He should have thought about the fact he would hate not talking to me before he lied, cheated, hurt me and fucked me over..
Then on top of that, i was kinda 'seeing' this guy who i just recently told that i didn't want it to go any further cos i'm not ready for a serious relationship again so soon after.
ive told him so many times and all the reasons why i don't want one over and over and over again but he continues to tell me how much he likes me and how much he wants to be with me.
WTF! way to go to make me feel like a heartless bitch.
I mean what does he think it was going to achive? its not going to change my mind and then when i tell him that for the billionth time he gets angry and has a go at me?? I just have the right fucking knack of picking the boys to date don't i? for fucks sake >:|

Your Ex is your Ex for a reason.

I can not believe after everything that fucker did to me and put me through he has the fucking nerve to contact me, yet again, randomly, out of no where saying he misses me like crazy and then re-add me on facebook after it was him who deleted me because he had a cranky that i didn't want anything to do with him. The fucking nerve he has asking me to forgive him, like he thought that that was even an option, the fact the he thought that there was even the slightest chance that i was going to forgive him outstands me, i can't believe he is that full of himself that he actually thought he could get away with it. WELL FUCK YOU! that is not going to happen if you wanted to be friends and me to forgive you because you miss me, that aint my fucking problem. You should have thought about that before you fucked me over, go play in traffic or rot in hell im not fussed anything painful to your persons >:|
